title: RECONSTRUCTING MORALITY A Conversation With Philip Pettit
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: Philip Pettit returns to the podcast to discuss his latest work The Birth of Ethics. We set of the challenge of resolving the seeming paradox of ethical truth in a naturalistic universe:  In a world explained by science with 'nothing spooky' going on, how, and why, would morality emerge?
